column4: i need help installing java to i installed all of the sunjava things and eclipse what do i do next to get my java working the site im testing it at is called runescape and it says i dont have java yet
install sun-java6-plugin or whatever package ubottu tells you for the plugin
no one can help you if you do not address the person whose directions you are following and replying to (we have no idea who you are talking to)
stop repeating what you already said.  Who are you talking to
if you want to talk to me, then put "jrib" in the front
pastebin the command you ran and the output
use a pastebin like paste.ubuntu.com in the future please.  That's not what I told you to install.  I asked you to install "sun-java6-plugin"
so what do i type in the terminal
install the sun-java6-plugin package, use whatever method you want
thank you so much man ure the best
